scripts.test: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat test ./test/mockfork.ts
scripts.node: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat node --fork https://eth-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/4Xp19JnP1z2aqbbmq92K3c9oMgflSwW_ --fork-block-number 14390000
scripts.uni: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat run scripts/test.ts
scripts.mockfork: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx hardhat run test/mockfork.ts
